Line.speaker: Jason Madison
Line.text: (Okay, the moment we’ve been waiting for. This is what those hours of summoning circle tutorial videos and shitty gig jobs have led me towards.)

Line.speaker: Jason Madison
Line.text: (With chalk staining my hands, the absolute best professional recording equipment for its price point, and a basement swirling with the residual energy of deceased relatives' old collectibles, I assert myself as the GodSlayer.)

Line.speaker: Jason Madison
Line.text: (Undeniable. Inescapable. Infinite. Nerves are beneath me.)

Line.speaker: Jason Madison
Line.text: (are we forgetting anything… ? NO. My destiny is absolute. It has already been written in the deterministic nature of space time!)

Line.speaker: Jason Madison
Line.text: (Yes… Now, all we have to do is set the catalyst at the center, and the remaining ingredients in the three positions surrounding it. Let’s do this.)
